info.author: ijl
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Mozilla Public License 2.0 (MPL 2.0)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
nahpackpy
=========

nahpackpy is an HTTP/2 `RFC 7541
HPACK <https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc7541.txt>`__ library. It wraps
the Rust `nahpack <https://github.com/ijl/nahpack>`__ library.

Usage
-----

.. code:: python

    >>> from nahpackpy import Decoder
    >>> decoder = Decoder()
    >>> headers = decoder.decode_block(
            b'\x82\x86\x84A\x8c\xf1\xe3\xc2\xe5\xf2:k\xa0\xab\x90\xf4\xff'
        )
    >>> for header in headers:
            print(header)
    Header(name=b':method', value=b'GET')
    Header(name=b':scheme', value=b'http')
    Header(name=b':path', value=b'/')
    Header(name=b':authority', value=b'www.example.com')

.. code:: python

    >>> from nahpackpy import Encoder
    >>> encoder = Encoder()
    >>> encoder.encode_block((
            (b':method', b'GET'),
            (b':scheme', b'http'),
            (b':path', b'/'),
            (b':authority', b'www.example.com'),
        ))
    b'\x82\x86\x84A\x8c\xf1\xe3\xc2\xe5\xf2:k\xa0\xab\x90\xf4\xff'

Installation
------------

Installation from source requires the use of the Rust language for
compilation of extensions. The "Nightly" channel of rust is required.
Download a package from
`rust-lang.org <https://www.rust-lang.org/install.html>`__.

You can then create a wheel, which will contain the compiled shared
library, by running ``make``. Or, run ``python setup.py install`` to
install in your current environment.

Misc
----

nahpackpy is licensed under the `Mozilla Public License, Version
2.0 <https://www.mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/>`__.
info.keywords: hpack http2 header compression encoding rfc 7541
info.name: nahpackpy
